name: Skimmed Milk Concentrate
desc: Skimmed Milk Concentrate (SMC) is produced from fresh pasteurized cowâ€™s skimmed milk by removing the water.
techs: Skimmed Milk Concentrate (SMC) is produced through water removal from skimmed milk. One method is evaporating the water by increasing the temperature, another one is by reverse osmosis using the membrane to separate water from the dry ingredient. Skimmed Milk Concentrate is a white liquid of creamy texture and a clean, milky smell.
shelf: The shelf life of Skimmed Milk Concentrate is 3-4 days.
packaging: Foodcom supplies its Business Partners with Skimmed Milk Concentrate in Big Bags.
applications: Skimmed Milk Concentrate is used in the production of flavored milks and low-fat yogurts.
